remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使若要显示，你必须将其添加到或。In order for a to be displayed, you must add it to a or . 若要创建子菜单，可以添加对象添加到的父属性。To create submenus, you can add objects to the property of the parent . 类提供了使你能够配置的外观和功能的菜单项的属性。The class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item. 若要显示的菜单项旁边的复选标记，请使用属性。To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the property. 可以使用此功能来确定的互相排斥的菜单项列表中选择的菜单项。You can use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items. 例如，如果你有一组用于设置中文本的颜色的菜单项控件，你可以使用属性来标识当前选定的颜色。For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a control, you can use the property to identify which color is currently selected. 属性可以用于定义某一键盘组合可以按下选择的菜单项。The property can be used to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item. 有关多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序中显示的对象，则可以使用方法合并的菜单 MDI 父对于为其的子窗体上来创建合并的菜单结构。For objects displayed in a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) application, you can use the method to merge the menus of an MDI parent for with that of its child forms to create a consolidated menu structure. 因为不能重复使用在多个位置在同一时间，如在和，你可以使用方法来创建一份在另一个位置中使用。Because a cannot be reused in multiple locations at the same time, such as in a and a , you can use the method to create a copy of a for use in another location. 事件可用于执行任务之前将显示一个菜单。The event enables you to perform tasks before a menu is displayed. 例如，你可以创建的事件处理程序以显示或隐藏菜单项在你的代码的状态上基于此事件。For example, you can create an event handler for this event to display or hide menu items based on the state of your code. 事件可用于执行任务，例如当用户将鼠标指针放在菜单项的应用程序的菜单项提供详细的帮助。The event enables you to perform tasks such as providing detailed help for your application's menu items when the user places the mouse pointer over a menu item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个窗体的菜单结构。The following code example creates a menu structure for a form. 该示例代码将添加表示顶级菜单项，用于选择字体大小，将子菜单项添加到它，然后将两个子菜单项添加到表示应用程序中的大型和小型字体选择该菜单项。The example code adds a to represent the top-level menu item, adds a submenu item to it for selecting a font size, and then adds two submenu items to that menu item that represent large and small font choices in an application. 该示例需要有对象名为`mainMenu1`和第四个对象命名的`menuItem1`， `menuItem2`， `menuItem3`，和`menuItem4`。The example requires that there is a object named `mainMenu1` and four objects named `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你具有的菜单项指定标题`text`参数，你还可以指定访问密钥由前放置一个 & 字符的字符，用作访问密钥。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' character before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要为访问键指定"文件"中的"F"，你将指定为该菜单项标题"& 文件"。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 可以使用此功能可供你菜单的键盘导航。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 设置`text`参数"`-`"会导致菜单项显示为分隔符 （一条横线），而不是标准菜单项。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，在构造时指定的菜单项的标题。The following code example creates a that specifies the caption of the menu item at the time it is constructed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你具有的菜单项指定标题`text`参数，你还可以指定访问密钥由前放置一个 & 字符用作访问密钥。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要为访问键指定"文件"中的"F"，你将指定为该菜单项标题"& 文件"。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 可以使用此功能可供你菜单的键盘导航。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 设置`text`参数"`-`"会导致菜单项显示为分隔符 （一条横线），而不是标准菜单项。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. 此外，你可以使用此构造函数指定一个委托，可将处理正在创建的菜单项的事件。In addition, you can use this constructor to specify a delegate that will handle the event for the menu item being created. 传递给此构造函数必须将配置为调用的事件处理程序可以处理事件。The that you pass to this constructor must be configured to call an event handler that can handle the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建用指定标题的对象和委托连接到的事件处理程序将处理菜单项的事件。The following code example creates a object with a specified caption and an delegate connected to an event handler that will handle the event for the menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你具有的菜单项指定标题`text`参数，你还可以指定访问密钥由前放置一个 & 字符用作访问密钥。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要为访问键指定"文件"中的"F"，你将指定为该菜单项标题"& 文件"。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 可以使用此功能可供你菜单的键盘导航。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 设置`text`参数"`-`"会导致菜单项显示为分隔符 （一条横线），而不是标准菜单项。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. `items`参数使你可以分配来定义该菜单项的子菜单的菜单项的数组。The `items` parameter enables you to assign an array of menu items to define a submenu of this menu item. 数组中的每个项还可以分配给它的菜单项的数组。Each item in the array can also have an array of menu items assigned to it. 这使你可以创建完整的菜单结构并将它们分配到的菜单项的构造函数。This enables you to create complete menu structures and assign them to the constructor for the menu item. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个对象用指定标题，连接到将处理该事件的方法的事件处理程序每个菜单项中子菜单项的数组。The following code example creates an object with a specified caption, an event handler connected to a method that will handle the event each menu item in an array of submenu items. '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要为访问键指定"文件"中的"F"，你将指定为该菜单项标题"& 文件"。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 可以使用此功能可供你菜单的键盘导航。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 设置`text`参数"`-`"会导致菜单项显示为分隔符 （一条横线），而不是标准菜单项。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your define a submenu of this menu item. 数组中的每个项还可以分配给它的菜单项的数组。Each item in the array can also have an array of menu items assigned to it. 这使你可以创建完整的菜单结构并将它们分配到的菜单项的构造函数。This enables you to create complete menu structures and assign them to the constructor for the menu item. `mergeType`和`mergeOrder`参数允许你确定此菜单项与另一个菜单合并的菜单项时的行为。The `mergeType` and `mergeOrder` parameters allow you to determine how this menu item will behave when the menu item is merged with another menu. 你为根据的值的指定`mergeType`参数，你可以添加、 删除、 替换或合并的菜单项和与它合并的菜单及其子菜单项。Depending on the value you specify for the `mergeType` parameter, you can either add, remove, replace, or merge the menu item and its submenu items with the menu that it is merging with. `mergeOrder`参数确定正在创建的菜单项在菜单合并时的放置位置。The `mergeOrder` parameter determines where the menu item being created will be positioned when the menu is merged. 此外，你可以使用此构造函数创建并将其连接到在代码中将处理菜单项的单击事件处理程序。In addition, you can use this constructor to create a and have it connected to an event handler in your code that will process the click of the menu item. 将传入此构造函数应配置为调用的事件处理程序可以处理事件。The that you pass into this constructor should be configured to call an event handler that can handle the event. 通过使用此构造函数版本，还可以连接和事件，以确定何时选择此菜单项。By using this constructor version, you can also connect the and events to determine when this menu item is selected. 这些事件可用于任务，例如确定显示子菜单项旁边的复选标记或用于启用或禁用菜单项基于应用程序的状态。You can use these events for tasks such as determining whether or not to display a check mark next to submenu items or to enable or disable menu items based on the state of the application. 和将仅对引发事件对象不父菜单项。The and events are raised only for objects that are not parent menu items. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建具有标题和快捷菜单项。The following code example creates a menu item that has a caption remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性创建每个菜单项旁边相互而不是水平放置在垂直列表菜单。You can use the property to create a menu where each menu item is placed next to each other horizontally instead of in a vertical list. 此属性还可用于创建包含多个行的顶级菜单项的菜单栏。You can also use this property to create a menu bar that contains multiple rows of top-level menu items. 此属性不同于，其属性中的每个菜单项的左边缘显示一个栏属性设置为`true`。This property differs from the property in that a bar is displayed on the left edge of each menu item that has the property set to `true`. 在菜单项不是顶级菜单项时，将仅显示栏。The bar is only displayed when the menu item is not a top-level menu item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建包含两个子菜单项。The following code example creates a with two submenu items. 这两个子菜单项水平显示而不是使用垂直属性。The two submenu items are displayed horizontally instead of vertically using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用结合与其他菜单提供应用程序的状态中的菜单项的属性。You can use the property in combination with other menu items in a menu to provide state for an application. 例如，可以在一组项来标识要为应用程序中的文本显示的字体大小的菜单项上放置一个复选标记。For example, you can place a check mark on a menu item in a group of items to identify the size of the font to be displayed for the text in an application. 你还可以使用属性来标识一组互斥菜单项中的所选的菜单项。You can also use the property to identify the selected menu item in a group of mutually exclusive menu items. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不能设置为`true`顶级菜单项。This property cannot be set to `true` for top-level menu items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性，以便在应用程序的状态。The following code example uses the property to provide the state in an application. 在此示例中，一组菜单项用于指定中的文本的颜色控件。In this example, a group of menu items are used to specify the color for the text in a control. 通过使用提供的事件处理程序的三个菜单项的事件。The event handler provided is used by the event of three menu items. 每个菜单项指定一种文本颜色， `menuItemRed` （红色） `menuItemGreen` （绿色），或`menuItemBlue`（蓝色）。Each menu item specifies a text color, `menuItemRed` (Red), `menuItemGreen` (Green), or `menuItemBlue` (Blue). 事件处理程序确定被单击的菜单项，将放置到选定的菜单项中，选中并更改窗体的文本颜色控件。The event handler determines which menu item was clicked, places a checkmark to the selected menu item, and changes the text color of the form's control. 该示例需要命名空间添加到此代码放置在窗体。The example requires that the namespace has been added to the form that this code is placed in. 该示例还要求已添加到窗体此代码示例将位于名为`textBox1`。The example also requires that a has been added to the form that this example code is located in that is named `textBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此菜单可以激活菜单项通过代码，而无需任何事件信息。You can use this menu to activate a menu item through code without passing any event information. 例如，如果你想要激活菜单项基于操作发生在你的应用程序，你可以调用方法， 。For example, if you want to activate a menu item based on an action that occurs in your application, you can call the method for that . ## Examples 在此示例中以编程方式通过单击菜单项`PerformClick`方法。In this example you programmatically click a menu item by using the `PerformClick` method. 首先，创建一个主菜单 (`mainMenu1`) 并向其中添加两个菜单项`menuItem1`(`File`) 和`menuItem2`(`Edit`)。First, you create a main menu (`mainMenu1`) and add to it two menu items, `menuItem1` (`File`) and `menuItem2` (`Edit`). 你还使用将数据发送到事件处理程序中，单击菜单项时的事件。You also use the event to send data to the event handler when a menu item is clicked. 然后，您使用`PerformClick`方法单击`File`菜单项。Then you use the `PerformClick` method to click the `File` menu item. 当启动应用程序，`File`激活菜单项，并且一个消息框包含文本"单击菜单上的文件。"When you start the application, the `File` menu item is activated, and a message box that contains the text "The File menu is clicked." 屏幕上显示。appears on the screen. 该示例需要你已创建了名为`Form1`。The example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[PerformClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PerformClick/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PerformClick/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PerformClick/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许您以引发而无需将任何事件信息传递给事件处理程序的事件。This method allows you to raise the event without passing any event information to the event handler. ## Examples 在此示例中以编程方式通过选择菜单项`PerformSelect`方法。In this example you programmatically select a menu item by using the `PerformSelect` method. 首先，创建一个主菜单 (`mainMenu1`) 并向其中添加两个菜单项`menuItem1`(`File`) 和`menuItem2`(`Edit`)。First, you create a main menu (`mainMenu1`) and add to it two menu items, `menuItem1` (`File`) and `menuItem2` (`Edit`). 你还使用事件将选定菜单项时，将数据发送到事件处理程序。You also use the event to send data to the event handler when a menu item is selected. 然后，您使用`PerformSelect`方法来选择`File`菜单项。Then you use the `PerformSelect` method to select the `File` menu item. 当启动应用程序，`File`选择菜单项，并且一个消息框包含文本"选定菜单上的文件。"When you start the application, the `File` menu item is selected, and a message box that contains the text "The File menu is selected." 屏幕上显示。appears on the screen. 该示例需要你已创建了名为`Form1`。The example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[PerformSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PerformSelect/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PerformSelect/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PerformSelect/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在显示菜单项的菜单项列表之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a menu item's list of menu items is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果菜单项包含子菜单项以显示仅发生此事件。This event only occurs when a menu item has submenu items to display. 此事件处理程序可用于添加、 删除、 启用、 禁用、 检查，或取消选中基于你的应用程序的状态之前所显示的菜单项。You can use this event handler to add, remove, enable, disable, check, or uncheck menu items based on the state of your application before they are displayed. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件，以确定是否中所显示的菜单显示之前启用提供支持进行剪切、 复制和删除操作的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether objects that provide support for cut, copy, and delete operations are enabled before the menu they are displayed in is shown. 该示例可确定如果`textBox1`、控制窗体上，启用了、 具有输入焦点，并且具有在启用之前选择的文本对象。The example determines if `textBox1`, a control on the form, is enabled, has input focus, and has text selected before enabling the objects. 此示例需要三个对象创建命名`menuCut`， `menuCopy`，和`menuDelete`已创建。This example requires that three objects are created named `menuCut`, `menuCopy`, and `menuDelete` have been created. [!code-cpp[MenuItem.Popup#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuItem.Popup/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MenuItem.Popup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuItem.Popup/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MenuItem.Popup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuItem.Popup/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RadioCheck { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，通过该值指示 （如果已选中）是否显示单选按钮而不是选中标记。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the , if checked, displays a radio-button instead of a check mark.

value.span: 如果要使用的是单选按钮而不是选中标记，则为 ；如果菜单项选中时要显示的是标准选中标记，则为 。

span.span: if a radio-button is to be used instead of a check mark; if the standard check mark is to be displayed when the menu item is checked.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选中标记并不一定表示一组菜单项的互斥状态。Check marks do not necessarily imply a mutually exclusive state for a group of menu items. 此属性可用于向用户指示菜单项的复选标记是互斥的。You can use this property to indicate to the user that the check mark of a menu item is mutually exclusive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来更改应用程序的状态。The following code example uses the property to change the state of an application. 在示例中，一组菜单项将提供用于指定中的文本的颜色控件。In the example, a group of menu items are provided that are used to specify the color for the text in an control. 在示例中，使用提供的事件处理程序的三个菜单项的事件。In the example, the event handler provided is used by the event of the three menu items. 每个菜单项指定一种颜色， `menuItemRed`， `menuItemGreen`，或`menuItemBlue`。Each menu item specifies a color, `menuItemRed`, `menuItemGreen`, or `menuItemBlue`. 事件处理程序确定被单击的菜单项，将放置到选定的菜单项中，选中并更改窗体的文本颜色控件，名为`textBox1`。The event handler determines which menu item was clicked, places a checkmark to the selected menu item, and changes the text color of the form's control, named `textBox1`. 此示例还使用属性来演示如何使用单选按钮检查来显示菜单项互相排斥。The example also uses the property to demonstrate how a radio-button check is used to show menu items that are mutually exclusive. 此示例需要命名空间添加到窗体，其中包含此代码。This example requires that the namespace has been added to the form that contains this code. [!code-cpp[Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当用户将指针放在菜单项上时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user places the pointer over a menu item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，用户将鼠标指针放在菜单项时，将引发此事件。This event is typically raised when the user places the mouse pointer over the menu item. 用户突出显示菜单项使用键盘，使用箭头键滚动到的菜单项时，也可以引发该事件。The event can also be raised when the user highlights a menu item using the keyboard by scrolling to the menu item with the arrow keys. 此事件可用于显示有关应用程序的状态栏中该菜单项的详细的帮助字符串。You can use this event to display a detailed help string pertaining to this menu item in an application's status bar. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果属性包含任何项，则不会引发此事件。If the property for the contains any items, this event is not raised. 适用于父菜单项不引发此事件。This event is not raised for parent menu items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件类将分配到的帮助文本的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event of the class to assign help text to a of a control. 此示例需要对象命名的`menuOpen`， `menuSave`，和`menuExit`添加到窗体上的控件。This example requires that objects named `menuOpen`, `menuSave`, and `menuExit` are added to a control on a form. 该示例还要求控件，名为`statusBar1`已添加到窗体。The example also requires that a control, named `statusBar1` has been added to the form. 控件应包含。The control should contain a . [!code-cpp[MenuItem.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuItem.Select/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MenuItem.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuItem.Select/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MenuItem.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuItem.Select/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键盘快捷方式提供菜单系统中，并提供对你的应用程序为这些用户不具有到鼠标或其他指针设备的访问权限的键盘访问，用户经常激活的方法使用菜单项。Shortcut keys provide a method for users to activate frequently used menu items in your menu system and to provide keyboard access to your application for those users who do not have access to a mouse or other pointer device. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个菜单项、 设置的标题，将分配的快捷键，进行菜单项可见，并显示菜单项的快捷键显示。The following code example creates a menu item, sets the caption, assigns a shortcut key, makes the menu item visible, and shows the shortcut key display for the menu item. 该示例需要已创建了名为`menuItem1`。The example requires that a has been created that is named `menuItem1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 为菜单项指定标题时，还可以通过将一个 & 字符用作访问密钥之前指定的访问密钥。When you specify a caption for your menu item, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要为访问键指定"文件"中的"F"，你将指定为该菜单项标题"& 文件"。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 可以使用此功能可供你菜单的键盘导航。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 此属性设置为"`-`"会导致菜单项显示为分隔符 （一条横线），而不是标准菜单项。Setting this property to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个菜单项、 设置的标题，将分配的快捷键，进行菜单项可见，并显示菜单项的快捷键显示。The following code example creates a menu item, sets the caption, assigns a shortcut key, makes the menu item visible, and shows the shortcut key display for the menu item. 该示例需要已创建了名为`menuItem1`。The example requires that a has been created that is named `menuItem1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于修改而无需合并菜单或禁用菜单的菜单结构。You can use this property to modify a menu structure without having to merge menus or disable menus. 例如，如果你想要隐藏完成从你的应用程序的菜单的功能的一部分，您可以隐藏它们从用户通过将此属性设置为`false`。For example, if you want to hide a complete section of functionality from the menus for your application, you can hide them from the user by setting this property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个菜单项、 设置的标题，将分配的快捷键，进行菜单项可见，并显示菜单项的快捷键显示。The following code example creates a menu item, sets the caption, assigns a shortcut key, makes the menu item visible, and shows the shortcut key display for the menu item. 该示例需要已创建了名为`menuItem1`。The example requires that a has been created that is named `menuItem1`.
